name: Super Voxel Deluxe Racing 2.0v
description:
Install instructions

Defeat the opponents by leaving them behind with their own dust. Then, rule the circuits and embrace this challenge. Super Voxel Deluxe Racing is a game currently being produced by a team of Uniritter academics.

*We would like that each person who download the game, write a positive/negative comments about the game for future improvements.*
